name: Classic pocket equine
description:
play with the little equines and mini games and fun

contents:

-5 languages

-name changer and info

-2 mini games (for now)

-can drag and drop the equines

-max 8 equines and 4 max rooms, if you have a these you will unlock a new stuff

controls (in base game): 

-mini games have informations

-left or right move the camera

-up or down change the camera speed or click the camera
